participant_1.background:
I like to look my best even when I'm at work.
I spend my days drawing, painting and making games that help animals in need.
I love listening to Tool while I'm working on my stamp collection and taking care of my dogs.
I'm happy to have a beautiful home and get to share my passion for gaming with others.
i am 21 years old.

participant_2.background:
I get my exercise by working on the farm.
I'm afraid of disappointing my family.
i sing many songs.
i write fiction for fun.
i am a personal chef.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking!
What do you do for a living?
I'm a personal chef, and I also write fiction for fun.
That's really interesting! What kind of fiction do you write?
I write mostly fantasy and sci-fi, but I'm also working on a historical fiction novel.
Cool! I've always wanted to write a novel, but I'm not sure where to start.
There are a lot of great resources out there to help you get started.
Yeah, I've heard that. I just need to find the time to sit down and actually write something.
Yeah, I know what you mean. It can be tough to find the time, but it's worth it when you finish something you're proud of.
I'm sure it is. I'm going to have to start making some time for it.
Good for you! I'm sure you'll do great.
No problem! Have a great day!
